title: Compiler panics while panicking when trying to infer defaulted const generic value

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
I think this error involves const generics + default values + async/await. The compiler produces the correct error message but then panics, and it also panics while panicking causing it to abort. ### Code (disclaimer: the examples here are not enough to reproduce the bug) I wanted to get a more minimal example but I can't find one that crashes, best I could do is this ```rs struct TestApp; struct TestAppBuilder; impl TestAppBuilder { fn new() -> Self { Self } async fn spawn(self) -> TestApp { TestApp } } impl TestApp { async fn new() -> Self { TestAppBuilder::new().spawn().await } } #[tokio::main] async fn main() { let x = TestApp::spawn().await; } ``` [playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2021&gist=56c128adad0b76a03572ae24867dd1c0) This example produces the exact same error message as my code does but does not crash. It also has more or less the same "shape" as my code. I made a branch to freeze this so it can be reproduced, but be warned that it's kind of a big project with sqlx and stuff. Hopefully if you want to pull and build it with `SQLX_OFFLINE=true cargo test` you can witness the panic. If you run into any errors while trying to do this just tell me and I'll help - [branch](https://github.com/mendess/blind-eternities/tree/rustc-panic) - [TestApp](https://github.com/mendess/blind-eternities/blob/2f3ad0ba63214e665a3e639514e0a82ac21356bd/server/tests/api/helpers.rs#L32) - [TestAppBuilder](https://github.com/mendess/blind-eternities/blob/2f3ad0ba63214e665a3e639514e0a82ac21356bd/server/tests/api/helpers.rs#L81) - [TestApp::spawn](https://github.com/mendess/blind-eternities/blob/2f3ad0ba63214e665a3e639514e0a82ac21356bd/server/tests/api/helpers.rs#L144) - [usages that causes the ice](https://github.com/mendess/blind-eternities/blob/2f3ad0ba63214e665a3e639514e0a82ac21356bd/server/tests/api/auth.rs#L7) ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.66.0 (69f9c33d7 2022-12-12) binary: rustc commit-hash: 69f9c33d71c871fc16ac445211281c6e7a340943 commit-date: 2022-12-12 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.66.0 LLVM version: 15.0.2 ``` ### Error output ``` error[E0282]: type annotations needed for `TestApp` --> server/tests/api/auth.rs:7:9 | 7 | let app = TestApp::spawn().await; | ^^^ | help: consider giving `app` an explicit type, where the the value of const parameter `CREATE_DB` is specified | 7 | let app: TestApp = TestApp::spawn().await; | ++++++++++++++++++++ ```
Backtrace
